diagnostics.file_limit_exceeded: Input file exceeds maximum file size
diagnostics.bad_string_escape: Invalid string escape: Escape sequence at the end of string.
diagnostics.excess_tokens: Excess token at the end of the file: {[token_type]}-
diagnostics.illegal_empty_group: Production sequence may not be empty.
diagnostics.integer_overflow: Integer value {[actual]} out of range. Values must be between {[min]} and {[max]}.
diagnostics.unexpected_token_eof: Expected a token of type '{[expected_type]}', but the end of file was discovered.
diagnostics.unexpected_token: Expected a token of type '{[expected_type]}', but found token {[actual]}.
diagnostics.unexpected_toplevel_token: Expected a top level declaration ('start', 'rule', 'node' or 'pattern'), but found token {[actual]}
diagnostics.unexpected_token_type_spec: Expected a type specifier, but found '{[actual]}'.
diagnostics.unexpected_token_mapping: Expected an AST mapping, but found '{[actual]}'.
diagnostics.unexpected_token_pattern: Expected a pattern definition, but found '{[actual]}'.
diagnostics.missing_start_symbol: Grammar file has no start symbol declared.
diagnostics.multiple_start_symbols: Another start rule '({[identifier]})' was already declared here: {[previous_location]}
diagnostics.duplicate_compound_field: Another field named '{[identifier]s}' was already declared here: {[previous_location]}
diagnostics.context_reference_out_of_bounds: Context reference index out of bounds. {[index]} was given, but the highest possible index is {[limit]}.
diagnostics.variant_does_not_exist: The variant field {[identifier]s} does not exist. The variant type is declared here: {[type_location]}
diagnostics.record_field_does_not_exist: The record field {[field]s} does not exist. The record type is declared here: {[type_location]}
diagnostics.record_field_already_initialized: The record field {[field]s} is already initialized. Previous initialization: {[prev_init]}
diagnostics.record_field_not_initialized: The record field {[field]s} was not initialized. Field declared here: {[field_location]}
diagnostics.mapping_requires_typed_rule: The use of a rule mapping requires that the rule has an explicitly declared type.
diagnostics.invalid_builtin_function: The builtin function {[name]s} does not exist!
